verses.verse: And I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with a cloud: <S%G3507><s%> and a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> was on his head, <S%G2776><s%> and his face <S%G4383><s%> was as it were the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and his feet <S%G4228><s%> as pillars <S%G4769><s%> of fire: <S%G4442><s%>

And he had <S%G2192><s%> in his hand <S%G5495><s%> a little <S%G974><s%> book <S%G974><s%> open: <S%G455><s%> and he set <S%G5087><s%> his right <S%G1188><s%> foot <S%G4228><s%> on the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and his left <S%G2176><s%> foot on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%>

And cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> as when a lion <S%G3023><s%> roars: <S%G3455><s%> and when <S%G3753><s%> he had cried, <S%G2896><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered <S%G2980><s%> their voices. <S%G5456><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> had uttered <S%G2980><s%> their voices, <S%G5456><s%> I was about <S%G3195><s%> to write: <S%G1125><s%> and I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, Seal <S%G4972><s%> up those things which <S%G3739><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> thunders <S%G1027><s%> uttered, <S%G2980><s%> and write <S%G1125><s%> them not.

And the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and on the earth <S%G1093><s%> lifted <S%G142><s%> up his hand <S%G5495><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

And swore <S%G3660><s%> by him that lives <S%G2198><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever, <S%G165><s%> who created <S%G2936><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and the things that therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and the things that therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> are, and the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and the things which are therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> that there should be time <S%G5550><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> longer: <S%G2089><s%>

But in the days <S%G2250><s%> of the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel, <S%G32><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he shall begin <S%G3195><s%> to sound, <S%G4537><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> should be finished, <S%G5055><s%> as he has declared <S%G2097><s%> to his servants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

And the voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to me again, <S%G3825><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> and take <S%G2983><s%> the little <S%G974><s%> book <S%G974><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is open <S%G455><s%> in the hand <S%G5495><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> on the sea <S%G2281><s%> and on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And I went <S%G565><s%> to the angel, <S%G32><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Give <S%G1325><s%> me the little <S%G974><s%> book. <S%G974><s%> And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, Take <S%G2983><s%> it, and eat <S%G2719><s%> it up; and it shall make <S%G4087><s%> your belly <S%G2836><s%> bitter, <S%G4087><s%> but it shall be in your mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as honey. <S%G3192><s%>

And I took <S%G4327><s%> the little <S%G974><s%> book <S%G974><s%> out of the angel's <S%G32><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and ate <S%G2719><s%> it up; and it was in my mouth <S%G4750><s%> sweet <S%G1099><s%> as honey: <S%G3192><s%> and as soon <S%G3753><s%> as I had eaten <S%G5315><s%> it, my belly <S%G2836><s%> was bitter. <S%G4087><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, You must <S%G1163><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> peoples, <S%G2992><s%> and nations, <S%G1484><s%> and tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and kings. <S%G935><s%>
